unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Festive Cheer in Kerala!**
normalised: energy and utilities: solar rooftop subsidies sparking festive cheer in Kerala!

unnormalised: Good news, folks! The Kerala State Electricity Board (KSEB) is extending its rooftop solar subsidy scheme, and it's like Onam came early! Forget buying new clothes; think about generating your own electricity!
normalised: good news, folks! the Kerala State Electricity Board (K S E B) is extending its rooftop solar subsidy scheme, and it is like Onam came early! forget buying new clothes; think about generating your own electricity!

unnormalised: The subsidy, which can knock off a substantial chunk of the installation cost (think upwards of Rs. 50,000 for a typical 3kW system, maybe even more!), is designed to encourage more homeowners in places like Kochi and Thiruvananthapuram to go green. Imagine, powering your ceiling fans while enjoying some yummy biryani, all thanks to the sun!
normalised: the subsidy, which can knock off a substantial chunk of the installation cost (think upwards of rupee fifty thousand for a typical three kilowatt system, maybe even more!), is designed to encourage more homeowners in places like Kochi and Thiruvananthapuram to go green. imagine, powering your ceiling fans while enjoying some yummy biryani, all thanks to the sun!

unnormalised: The initial phase saw great interest, and now they're opening it up again. The last date to apply is November 30th, so don't delay! This is a chance to reduce your electricity bills and do your bit for Mother Earth. Check the KSEB website or your local Vidyut Bhavan for all the details and eligibility criteria. Don't miss out; solar panels on your roof – a perfect Diwali gift for yourself!
normalised: the initial phase saw great interest, and now they are opening it up again. the last date to apply is november thirtieth, so don't delay! this is a chance to reduce your electricity bills and do your bit for Mother Earth. check the K S E B website or your local Vidyut Bhavan for all the details and eligibility criteria. don't miss out; solar panels on your roof – a perfect Diwali gift for yourself!
